location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ground for Royal Air Force Landing at Sohar

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 158 x 207mmMaterials: black and white photograph

mods.abstract: A photograph of the ground at Sohar, Oman, that was to be used as a landing ground for Royal Air Force aeroplanes. A stamp of the Royal Air Force dated 1 September 1929 can be found on the back of the photograph.
